Headline: #29 State Temporary Southbound Reroute near Lafayette/72nd
ShortDescription: Southbound 29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via Lafayette, 71st, Vincennes, 73rd, and Lafayette due to, police activity at Lafayette/72nd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via Lafayette, 71st, Vincennes, 73rd, and Lafayette due to, police activity at Lafayette/72nd.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #8 Halsted Temporary Reroute near Halsted/Garfield
ShortDescription: 8 Halsted buses temp. rerouted NB Halsted 58th Morgan Garfield Halsted; SB Halsted Garfield Morgan 58th Halsted due to, street blockage near Halsted/Garfield.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Halsted/Garfield, due to street blockage.

Northbound buses will operate via Halsted, 58th, Morgan, Garfield, and Halsted.

Southbound buses will operate via Halsted, Garfield, Morgan, 58th, and Halsted.

Allow extra travel time.
